hero.question: Will Bitcoin dip to $45,000 by December 31, 2026?
hero.prob_take: The 10-point drop suggests sellers are getting nervous about macro headwinds, but 49% odds still price in a coin flip when $45K requires a 30% crash from here, implying the market hasn't fully baked in recession risk. Watch Fed pivot signals in Q4 2025, because institutional buyers will front-run any dovish surprise and crush this bet before year-end volatility even arrives.

daily_take.headline: Bitcoin's 45K Dip Market Just Repriced. Smart Money Disagrees.
daily_take.deck: The Bitcoin $45K by EOY 2026 market tanked 10 points overnight to 49.0%, signaling conviction that BTC stays above support. But odds this close to fair value hide a real edge. With 2 years of runway and macro volatility still priced in, shorting a 49% probability on a coin that's crashed 50%+ before is leaving money on the table for patient bears.
